item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>The Olympics has certainly entertained us for the last month, we've sadly not done as well in the swimming or field and track events, Paula Radcliffe really tried but sadly stopped on the last leg of the marathon, she deserves a normal life now she's been through alot. <br/>I's sad that so many Atheletes turn to drugs, and go and pull out once there too, where as they could have given someone else that opportunity to compete. <br/>The Rowing has been fantastic along with the Kayaking and Equestrian events. </p>
item.content:encoded:
The Olympics has certainly entertained us for the last month, we’ve sadly not done as well in the swimming or field and track events, Paula Radcliffe really tried but sadly stopped on the last leg of the marathon, she deserves a normal life now she’s been through alot.
I’s sad that so many Atheletes turn to drugs, and go and pull out once there too, where as they could have given someone else that opportunity to compete.
The Rowing has been fantastic along with the Kayaking and Equestrian events.
